sentences.sContent: So why then do we reject the impermanence of the ever-changing universe when it comes to our own lives?
sentences.sContent_eng: So why then do we reject the impermanence of the ever-changing universe when it comes to our own lives?
sentences.sCn: 所以，为什么我们要拒绝这千变万化的宇宙中的无常，当它来到我们身边时？

sentences.sContent: During difficult times, be committed to resolving problems, but also lighten up and ride the waves of impermanence.
sentences.sContent_eng: During difficult times, be committed to resolving problems, but also lighten up and ride the waves of impermanence.
sentences.sCn: 身处困境时，既要全神贯注地解决问题，也要身心放松，驾驭无常的世事。
